fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An analysis of royal media coverage examined articles published between May 2018 and mid-January 2020, as the accompanying methodology and graphic made clear, not “mid-January 2019” as the first paragraph of the main article said (Duchess of Sussex does get ‘bad press’, with 43% negative stories, 18 January, page 9). • Other recently corrected articles include: Corrections and clarifications: Keir Starmer and the McLibel case Teenager who threatened suicide on road prosecuted for second time Technology in 2050: will it save humanity – or destroy us? Inside the odyssey: taking a closer look at Stanley Kubrick’s 2001
